channel.title: I HAVE ONE ISSUE WITH MY COMMAND [bakatool come back]

item.title: I HAVE ONE ISSUE WITH MY COMMAND [bakatool come back]
item.dc:creator: @iceman327 iceman327
item.description:
@iceman327 wrote:

[quote=“bakatool, post:6, topic:166333”]yes get rid of

So get rid of: updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;

under ur last playerEqupment add this all below (near end of command)

might not work cuz u also gotta set playerEqupmentN (number of items wielding)

setEquipment(playerEquipment[playerHat], playerEquipmentN[playerHat],
			playerHat);
	setEquipment(playerEquipment[playerCape], playerEquipmentN[playerCape],
			playerCape);
	setEquipment(playerEquipment[playerAmulet],
			playerEquipmentN[playerAmulet], playerAmulet);
	setEquipment(playerEquipment[playerArrows],
			playerEquipmentN[playerArrows], playerArrows);
	setEquipment(playerEquipment[playerChest],
			playerEquipmentN[playerChest], playerChest);
	setEquipment(playerEquipment[playerShield],
			playerEquipmentN[playerShield], playerShield);
	setEquipment(playerEquipment[playerLegs], playerEquipmentN[playerLegs],
			playerLegs);
	setEquipment(playerEquipment[playerHands],
			playerEquipmentN[playerHands], playerHands);
	setEquipment(playerEquipment[playerFeet], playerEquipmentN[playerFeet],
			playerFeet);
	setEquipment(playerEquipment[playerRing], playerEquipmentN[playerRing],
			playerRing);
	setEquipment(playerEquipment[playerWeapon],
			playerEquipmentN[playerWeapon], playerWeapon);[/quote]

this sorta worked,
but now theres a 0 next to the item in the equipment spot rofl

Read full topic

item.title: I HAVE ONE ISSUE WITH MY COMMAND [bakatool come back]
item.dc:creator: @Goodoo_dolls Goodoo dolls
item.description:
@Goodoo_dolls wrote:

[quote=“TeleNubby, post:8, topic:166333”]If that doesn’t work…

Simply move the:

updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;

To before the last } bracket.[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: I HAVE ONE ISSUE WITH MY COMMAND [bakatool come back]
item.dc:creator: @bakatool bakatool
item.description:
@bakatool wrote:

yes get rid of

So get rid of: updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;

under ur last playerEqupment add this all below (near end of command)

might not work cuz u also gotta set playerEqupmentN (number of items wielding)

setEquipment(playerEquipment[playerHat], playerEquipmentN[playerHat],
			playerHat);
	setEquipment(playerEquipment[playerCape], playerEquipmentN[playerCape],
			playerCape);
	setEquipment(playerEquipment[playerAmulet],
			playerEquipmentN[playerAmulet], playerAmulet);
	setEquipment(playerEquipment[playerArrows],
			playerEquipmentN[playerArrows], playerArrows);
	setEquipment(playerEquipment[playerChest],
			playerEquipmentN[playerChest], playerChest);
	setEquipment(playerEquipment[playerShield],
			playerEquipmentN[playerShield], playerShield);
	setEquipment(playerEquipment[playerLegs], playerEquipmentN[playerLegs],
			playerLegs);
	setEquipment(playerEquipment[playerHands],
			playerEquipmentN[playerHands], playerHands);
	setEquipment(playerEquipment[playerFeet], playerEquipmentN[playerFeet],
			playerFeet);
	setEquipment(playerEquipment[playerRing], playerEquipmentN[playerRing],
			playerRing);
	setEquipment(playerEquipment[playerWeapon],
			playerEquipmentN[playerWeapon], playerWeapon);

item.title: I HAVE ONE ISSUE WITH MY COMMAND [bakatool come back]
item.dc:creator: @iceman327 iceman327
item.description:
@iceman327 wrote:

Allright here it is

if (command.startsWith(“iceset”) && playerRights >= 2) {

updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
playerEquipment[playerHat]=1042;
playerEquipment[playerCape]=14089;
playerEquipment[playerAmulet]=14573;
playerEquipment[playerChest]=14567;
playerEquipment[playerShield]=3840;
playerEquipment[playerLegs]=14570;
playerEquipment[playerHands]=775;
playerEquipment[playerFeet]=1837;
playerEquipment[playerRing]=773;
playerEquipment[playerArrows]=-1;
playerEquipment[playerWeapon]=14558;
}

The problem is it doesnt show any change in the equipment spots
But it does change what I’m wearing…
Does anyone know how to fix

Read full topic
